text: William "Billy" Abercromby (14 September 1958 - June 2024) was a Scottish football player. He and Fraser Kirkwood wrote "Aber's Gonnae Get Ye: The Billy Abercromby Story". It was published in 2009. Abercromby's death was announced on 18 June 2024. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Paisley, Renfrewshire
title: Billy Abercromby
